title: Boutique Batemans Bay Country Retreat with Daily Breakfast
description:
Enjoy tranquillity and spectacular private lake views during a country-meets-coast stay at the beautiful Lincoln Downs Resort, Batemans Bay BW Signature Collection by Best Western, located in the gorgeous seaside town of Batemans Bay. Feel the day-to-day melt away among 11 acres of pristine gardens, a stone’s throw from the turquoise waves of Surfside Beach and the restaurant-lined seafront promenade.

Your serene escape includes daily breakfast, a welcome bottle of wine, a cheese platter to share with a glass of wine each and a relaxed 12pm late checkout.
location_description: Lincoln Downs Resort, Batemans Bay BW Signature Collection by Best Western
offer_address: 11683 Princes Hwy, North Batemans Bay NSW 2536

title: Grand Opening: NSW South Coast Boutique Escape with Mogo Wildlife Park Tickets
description:
Embrace boutique motel majesty on the magnificent South Coast with a stay at brand-new, beachy-cool The Isla. A modern homage to the iconic coastal escapes of yesteryear, The Isla’s vibrant design evokes equal parts nostalgia and laidback luxury - laze glamorously beneath mint-coloured umbrellas by the shimmering pool or head to the hotel's one-of-a-kind Cantina for a truly dazzling gallery of vending machine options, including canned cocktails, craft beers and gourmet chocolates.

Only a short drive from Batemans Bay, The Isla offers easy access to some of the country’s best beaches and surf spots. Wander over to nearby Corrigans Beach for gentle waters and golden tranquillity, savour fresh Clyde River oysters at the iconic Oyster Shed or head to the nearby Mogo Wildlife Park to check out Australia’s largest collection of endangered and exotic wildlife, including white rhinos, snow leopards and more.
